Title: Relates to awards to employees who prevail in actions on kick-back claims
Summary: Relates to awards to employees who prevail in actions on kick-back claims; provides that such employees shall be entitled to the full amount of what was received, liquidated damages, attorney's fees and prejudgment interest.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to awards to employees who prevail in actions on kick-back claims
